headline: Amazon (AMZN) Maintains Lead in US E-Commerce Retail, per JPM
summary: Amazon.com, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMZN) is placed 1st on our list of the best stocks to buy. On August 21, JPMorgan reported that Amazon grew its lead in the American e-commerce market during Q2 2025, mainly because of faster retail growth and strong logistics. In its updated e-commerce model for the United States, JPMorgan mentioned that online […]

headline: JPMorgan (JPM) to Pay Malaysia $330 Million in 1MDB Settlement
summary: JPMorgan Chase & Co. (NYSE:JPM) is placed 6th on our list of the best stocks to buy. On August 22, JPMorgan announced that it will pay the Malaysian government $330 million to settle its involvement in the multibillion dollar 1Malaysia Development Berhad (1MDB) state fund scandal. The settlement follows Swiss authorities finding JPM guilty and […]

headline: Why blockchain’s confidentiality problem is holding back banking
summary: Blockchain has delivered on many of its early promises - secure, transparent, tamper-proof - but for banking, one glaring dealbreaker remains, says Jason Delabays and that’s a lack of confidentiality

raw.headline: Why blockchain’s confidentiality problem is holding back banking

headline: Veteran Jobs Mission Coalition Surpasses 1 Million Veterans Hired
summary: WASHINGTON, September 04, 2025--The Veteran Jobs Mission, a coalition of more than 315 private-sector companies committed to expanding opportunities for U.S. military veterans and their families to find meaningful employment, today announced a major milestone: more than one million veterans have been hired by coalition member companies since the group was founded in 2011.

headline: JPMorgan to launch digital retail bank in Germany in 2026
summary: Germany will be the Wall Street bank’s second European retail market after entering the U.K. in 2021.

headline: Top banking stock picks ahead of expected Fed rate cuts
summary: The market is expecting the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates at the central bank's September meeting. KBW managing director and head of US bank research, Christopher McGratty, joins Market Catalysts to discuss how to invest in the financial sector (XLF) as banks are positioned to gain from loan growth driven by rate cuts. The analyst also names some of his top stock picks in the space, including JPMorgan (JPM), Bank of America (BAC), Citizens Financial (CFG), and KeyCorp (KEY). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
